SELECT f.SUBJECT_NAME,s.LAST_AMOUNT,s.AMOUNT_D,s.AMOUNT_C,s.FINAL_AMOUNT,s.WORK_DATE FROM accting_subject_summary s INNER JOIN accting_subject_info f ON s.SUBJECT_ID=f.ID WHERE 1=1
and s.WORK_DATE = #{workDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT SUM(s.LAST_AMOUNT) as LAST_AMOUNT ,SUM(s.AMOUNT_D) as AMOUNT_D, SUM(s.AMOUNT_C) as AMOUNT_C,SUM(s.FINAL_AMOUNT) as FINAL_AMOUNT,s.WORK_DATE FROM accting_subject_summary s WHERE 1=1
and s.WORK_DATE = #{workDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
